attributes.action: appoint Joanna Lumley to the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Based on her untiring work to defend the noble Ghurkkas, Joanna Lumley should be offered a seat in the House of Lords. She is a true defender of the people.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
